tool_description:
Access all playlist of PUAHK podcast. 
List out all the tracks by playlist.
name: PUAHK
title: PUAHK

api_list.name: Get Track
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com/track/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com/track/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Playlist

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit record playlist to be shown

api_list.name: Search Track
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com/search/2010/10/30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "puahk-podcast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
